title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) It is the
intent of the Commission of Investigation (the commission) to fully comply, to
the extent appropriate and as required by law as a public safety agency, with
the provisions of article 6-A of the Public Officers Law (the Personal Privacy

Protection Law). (b) These
regulations provide information concerning the procedures by which rights
granted by the Personal Privacy Protection Law, as are applicable to the
commission, may be asserted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
701.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
